attributes.action: Stop Neil Bamford from growing his hair any longer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Neil Bamford's hair is so big now it is causing minor traffic jams around Sawtry and animals have started to live in it. Quiet simply, it is a public and environmental problem. I would like a law passed to stop Neil growing his hair any longer then it already is.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
